content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 

### Iron plate smelter at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5) and burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when researching Automation
-  Ensure you have automation science packs in your inventory before attempting to research Automation
-  Make sure to add automation science packs to the lab input before researching Automation

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure you have the required ingredients to smelt before using the furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has the required fuel to operate

### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output before using the burner mining drill
-  Make sure the burner mining drill has the required fuel to operate

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure there is input liquid and fluid present in connections before using the steam engine

### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure the boiler has the required fuel to operate
-  Make sure the boiler has a connection to a pipe before using it

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump has a connection to a pipe before using it

### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has the required fuel to operate
-  Make sure the inserter has a pickup and drop position before using it
